name: Sweet Chili and Orange Marmalade Glazed Chicken Wings
author: bd.weld
summary: It doesn't get much easier than these three-ingredient sticky sweet wings. A combination of orange marmalade and sweet chili sauce make for some of the most addictive wings you've ever had.
ingredients: 2 pounds chicken wing pieces, drumettes and flats
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Set a wire rack inside a large foil-lined rimmed baking sheet; arrange chicken wings on top
Bake in the preheated oven until wings are no longer pink at the bone and the skin is crispy, 45 to 50 minutes
Mix orange marmalade and chili sauce in a large bowl until thoroughly combined
Add cooked wings to marmalade-chili sauce and toss until well coated
Plate wings and pour extra sauce on top
